Today in Donegal, it's a solid day with 6 ft @ 12s W swell and 11 mph SW winds. Best spots include Rossnowlagh and Tullan Strand, both working well throughout the day. Tomorrow, expect poor conditions with 8 ft @ 10s WSW swell and fresh 30 mph S winds, likely blown out everywhere. By the day after, conditions improve slightly with 10 ft @ 16s W swell, but still challenging due to 12 mph S winds. Best: today.
